sqlMap.select: select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate, r from (select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate, rownum r from (select num, couplename, usePoint, getPoint, place, regdate from dc_point)) where r>=#startRow# and r<=#endRow# order by num desc

select enumber, ename, eimg, wcouples, regdate, edate, sdate, wnumber, w, r from (select enumber, ename, eimg, wcouples, regdate, edate, sdate, wnumber, w , rownum r from (select enumber, ename, eimg, wcouples, regdate, edate, sdate, wnumber, w from event)) where r>=#startRow# and r<=#endRow# order by enumber desc
select * from event where ename like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
select * from dc_point where couplename like '%'||#couplename#||'%' and place = #place#
select * from event where wcouples like '%'||#keyword#||'%'
